page.title: 09Local News St.Austell
page.content: Lack of coordination between County Council and Restomel Borough Council may delay the building of a new Fire Station in St.Austell.The old British Rail site in Elliot Road may be used. A St.Austell girl won a Beauty Competion in London this week. Her prize takes her to Hawaii to compete in an international contest. Pupils of the Kernow School of Theatre Dance in St.Austell were 100% successful in their recent examinations.All 153 pupils gained an award. A St. Austell couple won a battle for redundancy pay from the Department of Employment When Sawles Dairy went into liquidation and ceased trading in 1983.This was decided by the local industrial tribunal.
